response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $800,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unparalleled benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $720,000. This is a remarkable opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discount. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 720000}
